means: 埃米尔（对穆斯林统治者的尊称）

sentence.Network_en: Voters will choose fifty of the seventy five deputies. The Emir will nominate the rest.
sentence.Network_cn: 选民将选出75名代表中的50名，其余代表由埃米尔任命。

sentence.Network_en: The emir, now 58, ousted his father in 1995 in a coup.
sentence.Network_cn: 哈马德?本?哈利法?阿勒萨尼现年58岁, 在1995年的一次政变中推翻其父.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (denoting a male descendant of Muhammad): from French émir, from Arabic 'amīr (see amir)

entry.tran: 埃米尔（伊斯兰教领袖的尊称）
entry.def: An emir is a Muslim ruler.

means.word_mean: 1. an independent ruler or chieftain (especially in Africa or Arabia)
